title: Multiply a Decimal by a Power of Ten.
text: Move the decimal point to the right the same number of places as the number of zeros in the power of 10.

title: Number of Zeros
text: How many zeros are there in 1000?

title: Adding Zeros
text: We can add zeros to the end of the number as needed.

title: Answer
text: What number do you get when you move the decimal point in 2.58 to the right by three decimal places and adding zero(s) as needed?
